name: Declaration becomes part of medical records
text: It shall be the responsibility of the declarant to provide for delivery of the notarized declaration to the attending physician.  In the event the declarant is comatose, incompetent, or otherwise mentally or physically incapable after executing the declaration, any other person may deliver the notarized declaration to the physician.  An attending physician who is so notified shall promptly make the declaration a part of the declarant's medical records. [L 1992, c 84, pt of §1]
